title: New: Rosie Carney – Your Moon
content:
Rosie Carney returns with yet another elegant slow burner that belies her age.

Your Moon is yet another sign that at just 20 years old Rosie songwriting chops are up there with many double her age. As ever her voice is soft and graceful with the chorus specifically showing how well Rosie is able to explore her range within the mellow, laid back tone of the song. From a production angle the way that the more reverb soaked guitars float around the cleaner acoustic adds beautifully to the tracks dreamy qualities, with the low key organ being another lovely touch. This is a truly stunning track and an incredibly easy listen.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d31
